name: Pizzeria Ludica

review.reviewBody: Carbonara was noodles with parm and bacon...that's it
98% sure the peperoni is yves salami vegetarian meat.
Love this place!!!! The pizza and pastas are really good
SO. FRICKIN. GOOD. Highly recommend!! I ordered the Hansa and Taluva, I couldn't stop eating either of them
The vegan caprese pizza is so good! They kept the basil leaves and balsamic glaze separate which was nice.
